content.p: Students in the School of Politics, History and International Relations can apply to study at one of our campuses in China or the UK for a period of one semester or one academic year through the Inter-Campus Exchange programme. As degree programmes are the same across all Nottingham campuses, you will carry on with your course exactly as if you studying at your home campus - making your academic transition both before and after your study abroad seamless. The China Campus is situated in Ningbo - a city of over five million people on the East coast of China. Ningbo is just a two hour train ride from Shanghai and two hours by air from Beijing. The campus at Ningbo provides accommodation, sports facilities and a shopping street. The currently has over 4,000 students. The UK Campus is situated in Nottingham, in the heart of England. The city boasts a large and diverse student population that is integral to the city itself. In addition to its impressive history and famous legends, Nottingham is a culturally diverse and vibrant city ideally suited towards student life. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
